page.title: 03BANK END SCHOOL
page.content: THERE IS A PLAQUE IN THE ENTRANCE HALL WHICH SHOWS WE HAVE A GARDEN NATURE RESERVE IN WHICH WE HAVE MORE THAN 3O DIFFERENT SPECIES OF TREE AS WELL AS MANY SHRUBS AND OTHER PLANTS. THE SCHOOL; STANDS AT THE EDGE OF A HOUSING ESTATE AND YET HEDGEHOGS, WEASELS, SQUIRRELS AND WILD RABBITS HAVE BEEN SEEN IN THE GROUNDS ALONG WITH A VARIETY OF WILD BIRDS INCLUDING WRENS, BLUE-TITS, BULLFINCHES, WAGTAILS, ROBINS AND MORE COMMON SPECIES. WE HAVE A COLLECTION OF DOMESTIC AND ORNAMENTAL BIRDS INCLUDING PEAFOWL, PHEASANTS, DUCKS, GEESE, DOVES AND BANTAMS, AS WELL AS 3 TAWNY OWLS AND 3 KESTRELS, A NUMBER OF SMALL MAMMALS AND 3 TORTOISE.WE HAVE WEEKLY DISCOS, ANNUAL FAYRES, CONCERTS AND CAMPS UNDER CANVAS, AND WE THINK OUR SCHOOL IS THE BEST IN YORKSHIRE.
